name: person_id
description: A foreign key identifier to the person for whom the device data was recorded.

name: device_date
description: The date the device data was recorded.

name: battery
description: The battery level of the device. Supported: High | Medium | Low | Empty

name: battery_level
description: The battery level percentage of the device.

name: device_version
description: The product name of the device.

name: device_type
description: The device type. Supported : TRACKER | SCALE

name: last_sync_time
description: Represents the last time the device was synced with the Fitbit mobile application.
